column3: Faculty of Engineering, Environment and Computing
column5: The Engineering Management MSc seeks to prepare you to be a successful senior manager for engineering companies operating in highly competitive international environments. It is open to full-time and part-time students.The course incorporates three alternative pathways, allowing you to select a route that is clearly focused on your anticipated or current career path in a manufacturing company. The selection of one of the three pathways (Engineering Business Management, Technical, or Operations) adds specific career-focused content to the core modules.
column7: UK Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 10400 | 4000 (Work placement option additional fee)  International Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 - *17900 | 4000 (Work placement option additional fee)
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 2 years full time with work placement
